info.title: OOPS projections and automatic table substitution

article.simpara: The OOPS module provides some functions that simplify the creation and use of projections.
To use OOPS, you can execute this code:
article.programlisting: CREATE PROJECTION xxx OF TABLE yyy(column1, column2, ...) GROUP BY (column1, column2, ...)
article.simpara: The main advantage of OOPS projection mechanism is that it allows to automatically substitute queries on original tables with projections. There is a configuration parameter OOPS.auto_substitute_projections that allows to enable such substitution. By default it is disabled, because OOPS projections may not be synchronized with the original table and a query on a projection may return different result.
